languages.text: "Лишь признав свою порочность и встав на путь искупления, исторгнете вы мрак из своей души и впустите свет Императора!"
"Only by admitting to your depravity and taking the path of redemption will you drive the darkness out of your soul and let the Emperor's light into it!"
languages.original_text: "Лишь признав свою порочность и встав на путь искупления, исторгнете вы мрак из своей души и впустите свет Императора!"

traits.locale_text: "Only by admitting to your depravity and taking the path of redemption will you drive the darkness out of your soul and let the Emperor's light into it!"
"Only by admitting to your depravity and taking the path of redemption will you drive the darkness out of your soul and let the Emperor's light into it!"
"Only by admitting to your depravity and taking the path of redemption will you drive the darkness out of your soul and let the Emperor's light into it!"
"Only by admitting to your depravity and taking the path of redemption will you drive the darkness out of your soul and let the Emperor's light into it!"
"Only by admitting to your depravity and taking the path of redemption will you drive the darkness out of your soul and let the Emperor's light into it!"
"Only by admitting to your depravity and taking the path of redemption will you drive the darkness out of your soul and let the Emperor's light into it!"

languages.text: “只有承认你们的堕落，踏上救赎之路，才能驱走灵魂中的黑暗，让帝皇的光芒照进你们的灵魂！”
languages.original_text: "Only by admitting to your depravity and taking the path of redemption will you drive the darkness out of your soul and let the Emperor's light into it!"

traits.locale_text: “只有承认你们的堕落，踏上救赎之路，才能驱走灵魂中的黑暗，让帝皇的光芒照进你们的灵魂！”

languages.text: 「己の堕落を認め贖罪の道を歩めば、闇を己の魂から追い出し、皇帝陛下の御光を呼び込む事が出来るであろう！」
languages.original_text: "Only by admitting to your depravity and taking the path of redemption will you drive the darkness out of your soul and let the Emperor's light into it!"

traits.locale_text: 「己の堕落を認め贖罪の道を歩めば、闇を己の魂から追い出し、皇帝陛下の御光を呼び込む事が出来るであろう！」

languages.text: «¡Solo admitiendo su depravación y tomando el camino de la redención expulsarán la oscuridad de su alma y dejarán que la luz del Emperador entre en ella!».
languages.original_text: "Only by admitting to your depravity and taking the path of redemption will you drive the darkness out of your soul and let the Emperor's light into it!"

traits.locale_text: «¡Solo admitiendo su depravación y tomando el camino de la redención expulsarán la oscuridad de su alma y dejarán que la luz del Emperador entre en ella!».

languages.text: "Nur, indem Ihr Euch Eure Verkommenheit eingesteht und den Pfad der Erlösung einschlagt, könnt Ihr die Dunkelheit aus Eurer Seele vertreiben und das Licht des Imperators hineinlassen!"
languages.original_text: "Only by admitting to your depravity and taking the path of redemption will you drive the darkness out of your soul and let the Emperor's light into it!"

traits.locale_text: "Nur, indem Ihr Euch Eure Verkommenheit eingesteht und den Pfad der Erlösung einschlagt, könnt Ihr die Dunkelheit aus Eurer Seele vertreiben und das Licht des Imperators hineinlassen!"

languages.text: « Ce n'est qu'en admettant votre propre dépravation et en empruntant la voie de la rédemption que la lumière de l'Empereur pourra chasser les ténèbres qui habitent vos âmes ! »
languages.original_text: "Only by admitting to your depravity and taking the path of redemption will you drive the darkness out of your soul and let the Emperor's light into it!"

traits.locale_text: « Ce n'est qu'en admettant votre propre dépravation et en empruntant la voie de la rédemption que la lumière de l'Empereur pourra chasser les ténèbres qui habitent vos âmes ! »

languages.text: "Ruhunuzdaki karanlığı uzaklaştırmanın ve içinizi İmparator'un ışığıyla doldurmanın tek yolu, ahlak bozukluğunuzu itiraf etmek ve affedilmek için çabalamaktır!"
languages.original_text: "Only by admitting to your depravity and taking the path of redemption will you drive the darkness out of your soul and let the Emperor's light into it!"

traits.locale_text: "Ruhunuzdaki karanlığı uzaklaştırmanın ve içinizi İmparator'un ışığıyla doldurmanın tek yolu, ahlak bozukluğunuzu itiraf etmek ve affedilmek için çabalamaktır!"
